|lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Trusted Platform Module;Atmel;AT97SC3203;;1;,,, 512-Bit Serial RTC;ST Microelectronics;M41T94;;1;,,, 4K-bit 3-Wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT93C66A;;1;,,, Flash based 8-bit CMOS Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F916;;1;,,, Flash based 8-bit CMOS Microcontroller;Microchip;PIC16F690;;1;,,, 3V RS232 Transceiver;Maxim Integrated;MAX3232E;;1;,,, 802.3af PoE-PD interface and PWM controller;ST Microelectronics;PM8800A;;1;,,, 16-bit transparent D-type latch;Texas Instruments;SN74LVTH16373;;1;,,, Quadruple 2-Input Positive-And Gate;Texas Instruments;SN74HC08;;1;,,, Dual D-type positive-edge-triggered flip-flop;Texas Instruments;SN74HC74;;2;,,, Dual Channel Active EMI/ESD Suppressor;Akros Silicon;AS1602;;4;,,, 1.5A Low Noise Fast Response LDO Regulator;Linear Technology;LT1963A;;1;,,, Low Voltage Dual D-Type Positive Edge-Triggered Flip-Flop;Fairchild Semiconductor;74LCX74;;1;,,, Hex Inverter with Schmitt Trigger Input;Fairchild Semiconductor;74ACT14;;1;,,, 30V, 4A N-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild Semiconductor;FDFS6N754;;4; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup, enterprise class |stock_boot=Aerohive Boot Loader;1.2.5.24
